attributes.action: Banning production and sale of disposable BBQs
attributes.additional_details:
Disposable BBQs are extremely wasteful and dangerous.

They are one use consumable items that add to pollution.

They are a major cause of forest fires as people light them on irresponsibly when visiting forests.
attributes.background: Banning production and sale of disposable BBQs

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315762
